title: Customer Behavior Data Analization
description: This project explores customer behavior patterns using a multi-layered analytical approach combining raw data, interactive dashboards, and Python-based insights.

title: Plants Sales Dashboard
description: This interactive dashboard visualizes key metrics from a plant retail business, helping stakeholders understand sales performance, customer behavior, and inventory trends.

title: Excel Learning Website
description: This website is designed as a friendly and accessible platform to help users master Microsoft Excel, from basic formulas to advanced analytics. Whether you're a student, professional, or lifelong learner, this site offers structured guidance to build real-world spreadsheet skills.

title: Mastery Excel With This
description: Learn the 15 most essential Excel functions with clear examples and tips. A complete guide to boost your skills and productivity.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Aplikasi pelacak kebugaran dengan analisis data kesehatan dan rekomendasi workout.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Dashboard analitik media sosial dengan visualisasi data yang menarik dan informatif.
